reactor.core.publisher

类 Operators.DeferredSubscription

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.core.publisher.Operators.DeferredSubscription
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.reactivestreams.Subscription, Scannable
    封闭类:
    Operators

    public static class Operators.DeferredSubscription
extends Object
implements org.reactivestreams.Subscription, Scannable
    Base class for Subscribers that will receive their Subscriptions at any time, yet they might also need to be cancelled or requested at any time.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        从接口复制的说明: org.reactivestreams.Subscription
        Request the Publisher to stop sending data and clean up resources.

        Data may still be sent to meet previously signalled demand after calling cancel.

        指定者:
        cancel 在接口中 org.reactivestreams.Subscription

      • scanUnsafe

        @Nullable
public Object scanUnsafe(Scannable.Attr key)
        从接口复制的说明: Scannable
        This method is used internally by components to define their key-value mappings in a single place. Although it is ignoring the generic type of the Scannable.Attr key, implementors should take care to return values of the correct type, and return null if no specific value is available.

        For public consumption of attributes, prefer using Scannable.scan(Attr), which will return a typed value and fall back to the key's default if the component didn't define any mapping.

        指定者:
        scanUnsafe 在接口中 Scannable
        参数:
        key - a Scannable.Attr to resolve for the component.
        返回:
        the value associated to the key for that specific component, or null if none.

      • request

        public void request(long n)
        从接口复制的说明: org.reactivestreams.Subscription
        No events will be sent by a Publisher until demand is signaled via this method.

        It can be called however often and whenever needed—but the outstanding cumulative demand must never exceed Long.MAX_VALUE. An outstanding cumulative demand of Long.MAX_VALUE may be treated by the Publisher as "effectively unbounded".

        Whatever has been requested can be sent by the Publisher so only signal demand for what can be safely handled.

        A Publisher can send less than is requested if the stream ends but then must emit either Subscriber.onError(Throwable) or Subscriber.onComplete().

        指定者:
        request 在接口中 org.reactivestreams.Subscription
        参数:
        n - the strictly positive number of elements to requests to the upstream Publisher

      • set

        public final boolean set(org.reactivestreams.Subscription s)
        Atomically sets the single subscription and requests the missed amount from it.
        参数:
        s - the subscription to push
        返回:
        false if this arbiter is cancelled or there was a subscription already push
